name: Forge
blurb: Online, multiplayer combat at its best. An incredible blend of MMO-style abilities and FPS controls. No grind, no treadmill, just fun.

rewards.reward: Category A -\r\n\r\nReceive a digital copy of FORGE for PC ahead of the official release date to the public + in game founders title for all to see.

Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + Ultra High Resolution desktop background of character, companion or world + exclusive access to our closed beta + the first 6 months of all downloadable content (DLC) Forge releases for free.  Also, you\u2019ll be allowed to join our forums as a founding member of the test team and have private access to future, new alpha releases, news and updates.

Category F - Forge Standalone reward tier: Receive a digital copy of FORGE for PC ahead of the official release date to the public + in game founders title for all to see + beta access + 1 year free DLC (read FAQ for details on what DLC means for Forge). This tier does not include any prior reward tiers. This tier is a way to provide you with the option to forego other physical and virtual rewards and pre-order only Forge and Forge expansion content.

Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + digital PDF copy of all FORGE concept artwork, sketches and drawings (3D and 2D) + the first year of all DLC FORGE releases for free.  That's right - one full year of DLC.
Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + the first 2 years of all DLC FORGE releases for free.  You heard that right - 2 years of DLC - gratis!
Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + limited edition FORGE poster featuring digital art from the game + your name in the official game credits (please add $10 for international shipping).
Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + get an exclusive player skin on your character + receive an Astro Scout gaming backpack (please add $15 for international shipping).
Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + receive 5 additional copies of the game for your friends and family + receive a pair of Astro A*Stars earbuds (please add $15 for international shipping).
Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + receive a FORGE branded Astro A40 gaming headset (please add $20 for international shipping).

Category A -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards + all DLC FORGE releases for life.  You'll receive any paid DLC that FORGE releases for the game absolutely free - we're nuts, we know. (please add $20 for international shipping)
Category B -\r\n\r\nAll Above rewards + Limited edition custom FORGE Lithograph etched by the game artists (please add $30 for international shipping).

Category B -\r\n\r\nAll above rewards + your name, translated into FORGE language, engraved into a gravestone or other monument/structure in the actual game itself + receive a FORGE Origin III Laptop fully configured to play FORGE at the highest possible settings (please add $150 for international shipping). [please refer to the project page for exact specifications on the computer]

Category B -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards in Category A and B + we will incorporate your likeness in the form of a FORGE statue in the game itself + we\u2019ll work you and your likeness into the game lore.  Forever become part of FORGE history (please add $150 for international shipping).

Category C -\r\n\r\nAbove rewards in Category A + Limited Edition custom FORGE Lithograph etched by the game artists + your name, translated into FORGE language, engraved into a gravestone or other monument/structure in the actual game itself + we will incorporate your likeness in the form of a FORGE statue in the game itself + we\u2019ll work you and your likeness into the game lore + choose between a FORGE Origin X gaming laptop or a FORGE Origin X gaming desktop computer, each custom painted for Forge and ready to play at the highest possible settings (please add $150 for international shipping). [please refer to the project page for exact specifications on the computers]
